title: Markdown Post Example
description: This is a example of all elements that you can use in a markdown post. Here you can see how to use headers, text styles, lists, links, images, blockquotes and code.

body.raw:
# Text Styles in Markdown

This is a regular paragraph of text.

# Header 1

## Header 2

### Header 3

## Text Styles

_Texto en cursiva_

**Texto en negrita**

**_Texto en cursiva y negrita_**

## Lists

### Ordered List

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Unordered List

- Item A
- Item B
  - Subitem B.1
  - Subitem B.2

## Links

[Link Text](https://www.example.com)

## Images

![Alt Text](/portfolio-logo.png)

## Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote.

## Code

`Inline Code`

```javascript
const formatDate = (date: string) => {
  const options: Intl.DateTimeFormatOptions = {
    year: 'numeric',
    month: 'long',
    day: 'numeric'
  };
  return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options);
};
```
